attributes.iconName: =if(@currentField == 'New', 'NewAnalyticsQuery', if(@currentField == 'In Progress', 'Forward', if(@currentField == 'Closed', 'CheckMark', if(@currentField == 'On Hold', 'AsteriskSolid', if(@currentField == 'Under Review', 'SchoolDataSyncLogo', if(@currentField == 'Scheduled', 'ScheduleEventAction', if(@currentField == 'Rejected', 'LogRemove','NewAnalyticsQuery'))))
